--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tears glisten

Like the spokes

of the bike 

Under the summer sun

We rode

We fell

One bruise on the knee

Two on the heart

--------------------------------------

Frowns harden

Like the bottle

Of our favourite soda

Before it shattered

Under the heat

Of our last argument

Words drawn 

Each sharper 

Than the last

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Slates clean

Like the white lilies

Freshly picked 

On autumn morning

Left on 

Doorposts

Day Night

Day Night

Leaves wilt

And fall

Under the weight

Of unspoken apologies
